content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I broke up with my ex and I realize that there is no one who really loves me.
I' m very sorry to hear that. What kind of person are you in that situation?
I blew up my relationship by cheating.
That' s a terrible thing to do. It sounds like you have a lot on your plate right now that isn' t being fully appreciated. Have you looked into seeing a new love interest, such as an online one?
